xmlCoding(String) - Static method in class pgrid.util.XMLTools
Replaces and returns reserved XML characters by their definied entities. '&' is replaced by '&'.

XMLizable - Interface in pgrid
This interface defines methods and fields required by classes to be created from an XML string and to produce an XML string to represent themself.
